about_the_game:
Welcome to Geometric Link

Geometric Link is a mix of Tower-Defense and Survival. Defeat hordes of enemies by purchasing towers, upgrading them, and enhancing them with items to unlock even more powerful upgrades.

Roguelike Tower-Defense

Every tower is different in each run. Through a variety of combinations of upgrades and items, you can change the behavior of each tower to the deepest level. Everything from rocket launcher Gatlings to burning crossbows is possible.

Survive 20 Intense Waves

The goal of the game is to survive 20 increasingly difficult waves and eventually defeat one of many powerful bosses. Increase the challenge by choosing from 10 different difficulty levels and test your strategy under extreme conditions.

Every Run Offers New Opportunities

With every success and defeat, new content is unlocked, providing variety and new strategic opportunities in your subsequent games. Look forward to characters with special abilities, new towers, as well as innovative upgrades and items that allow you to develop entirely new strategies.

Upon launching in Early Access, Geometric Link will offer the following content:

1 playable character (Cubie)
25 unique towers
25 upgrades to improve your towers
25 items for strategic depth
5 different enemy types for varied challenges
1 epic boss fight

For the final version, we plan to expand the content and implement new features based on feedback from our community.
